LanguageData.Cinder_BlackHair.label: 黑发
LanguageData.Cinder_BlackHair.description: 携带者会长出特定颜色的头发
LanguageData.Cinder_BrownHair.label: 茶发
LanguageData.Cinder_BrownHair.description: 携带者会长出特定颜色的头发
LanguageData.Cinder_LightTanHair.label: 浅茶发
LanguageData.Cinder_LightTanHair.description: 携带者会长出特定颜色的头发
LanguageData.Cinder_ErosionEyes.label: 侵蚀眼
LanguageData.Cinder_ErosionEyes.description: 携带者会生长有被侵蚀的眼睛
LanguageData.Cinder_Fin.label: 鳍
LanguageData.Cinder_HairOnly.label: 烟烬发
LanguageData.Cinder_HairOnly.description: 携带者的头发只会长出烟烬的发型样式
LanguageData.Cinder_LowBlackHair.label: 深黑发
LanguageData.Cinder_LowBlackHair.description: 携带者会长出特定颜色的头发
LanguageData.Cinder_Regeneration.label: 无定形再生
LanguageData.Cinder_Regeneration.description: 当携带者受到伤害时，体内的无定形聚合物会按照原来的身体结构再生
LanguageData.Cinder_Revive.label: 无定形复苏
LanguageData.Cinder_Revive.description: 携带者会在死亡时复活一次
LanguageData.Cinder_UncontrollableTentacle.label: 不可控触手
LanguageData.Cinder_UncontrollableTentacle.descriptio: 携带者体内的无定形聚合物会以一种触手的方式出现在身体表面，这种不可控的触手没有影响携带者本身的生物结构，携带者的操作能力被一个随机值影响，而近战伤害与近战冷却都有所增加
LanguageData.Cinder_WhiteHair.label: 白发
LanguageData.Cinder_WhiteHair.description: 携带者会长出特定颜色的头发
LanguageData.CinderHead_Female.label: 烟烬头部
LanguageData.CinderHead_Female.description: 携带者的脸部会长得像某个人
